rukus.text: 53|33|Ojo on kasero, ki [az haq] ruj ʙartoft, didai
53|34|Va andake infoq kard va [sipas] xuddori namud
53|35|Ojo ilmi ƣajʙ dorad va [ojandaro] meʙinad
53|36|Ojo ʙoxaʙar nasudaast az matoliʙi kitoʙi osmonii Muso
53|37|va [ta'limoti] Iʙrohim, ki haqqi [risolat va ʙandagii Mo]-ro ʙa tamomi ado kard
53|38|Ki hec gunahgore ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus naxohad kasid
53|39|Va in ki inson faqat samarai talos [-u nijati] xudro xohad dost
53|40|Va in ki ʙe gumon talosi u [dar muhosiʙai a'molas dar ruzi qijomat] manzur xohad sud
53|41|On goh podosasro ʙa tamomi xohand dod
53|42|Va in ki ʙozgast [-i hamai umur] ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
53|43|Va Ust, ki mexandonad va megirjonad
53|44|Va Ust, ki memironad va [dar oxirat] zinda mekunad
53|45|Va ham Ust, ki zavci naru modaro meofarad
53|46|az nutfae, ki [dar rahim] rexta mesavad
53|47|va padid ovardani duʙorai onho [dar qijomat niz ʙar uhdai] Alloh taolo ast
53|48|Va Ust, ki [sumoro] ʙenijoz mekunad va sarmoja meʙaxsad
53|49|Va Ust, ki Parvardigori [sitorai] «Si'ro» ast
53|50|Va Ust, ki qavmi Odro dar guzasta halok kard
53|51|Va qavmi Samudro [niz noʙud kard] va [hec jak az ononro] ʙoqi naguzost
53|52|Va qavmi Nuhro, ki sitamgortar va sarkastar ʙudand, pes az on [halok namud]
53|53|Va sahrhoi zerurusuda [-i qavmi Lut]-ro dar ham kuʙid
53|54|Va ononro [ʙo azoʙe farogir] – cunon ki ʙojad pusonid
53|55|Hol [ej inson] dar mavridi kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigorat tardid ravo medori [va mucodala mekuni]
53|56|In [pajomʙar niz] husdordihandaest az [guruhi] husdordihandagoni pesin
53|57|Qijomat nazdik mesavad
53|58|Va hec kas – cuz Alloh taolo – nametavonad oskoras kunad [va saxtihojasro ʙartaraf sozad]
53|59|[Ej musrikon] Ojo az in suxan dar sigifted
53|60|Va dar holi ƣaflat va ƣurur [ʙa ojoti Qur'on] mexanded va [az sunidani husdorhojas nametarsed va] ask namerezed
53|61|Va sumo ʙozikunandagoned
53|62|Pas, [hamagi] ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda kuned va [tanho] Uro ʙiparasted
